schools.name: Meridian Jr High School
schools.school-summary: Meridian Jr High School, a public school located in Stillman Valley, IL, serves grades 6-8 in the Meridian Community Unit School District 223.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 5 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Highland Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Highland Elementary School, a public school located in Stillman Valley, IL, serves grades PK-2 in the Meridian Community Unit School District 223.

schools.name: Stillman Valley High School
schools.school-summary: Stillman Valley High School, a public school located in Stillman Valley, IL, serves grades 9-12 in the Meridian Community Unit School District 223.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 6 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
